meanings.sent3: The abreaction in the movie scene was so intense, it made the audience gasp.
meanings.sent4: His abreaction to the news was like a volcano erupting, overwhelming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The therapist guided her through the abreaction, helping her find peace.
